column1:
.cf:before,
    .cf:after {
        content: "" ""; /* 1 */
        display: table; /* 2 */
    }
    
    .cf:after {
        clear: both;
    }
    
    /**
     * For IE 6/7 only
     * Include this rule to trigger hasLayout and contain floats.
     */
    .cf {
        *zoom: 1;
    }
